actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Committee on Government Operations discharged in House.

actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Rereferred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide that no relocation payments made under the Uniform Relocation Assistance Act shall be paid to persons who are unlawfully present in the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Uniform Relocation Assistance and Real Property Acquisition Policies Act to redefine the term "person" in order to exclude persons who are unlawfully present in the United States from entitlement to relocation payments.

titles.title: A bill to provide that no relocation payments made under the Uniform Relocation Assistance Act shall be paid to persons who are unlawfully present in the United States.
